name: Defrag Deactivation
description: Detects the deactivation and disabling of the Scheduled defragmentation task as seen by Slingshot APT group
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4701 AND winlog.event_data.TaskName:\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Defrag\\ScheduledDefrag)`
